name: Lin Quest
description:
This game contains swearing, mild sexual themes, and violence.

------------------------------------

-A war between Moonlight and Sunrise-

Lin Xu, a gangster working for the Midnight Queens. has been blackmailed into assassinating a young girl, and finds out that her target is being protected by Betty Hunter.  A very talented markswoman from a rivalling gang, named the Crimson Maidens. The two of them must race each other through the brutal and complex world of organized crime to reach their goals as they fight for what they believe in and for the people that they care for.

-Satisfying and high-octane turn-based RPG combat-

Quick RPG fights where a smart usage of skills and resources determine the result of every match. Boss fights that test your knowledge of your characters' movesets and abilities.

-Explore Vancouver and meet its people!-

Explore the dying Chinatown of Moonlight, the recently developed bougie neighbourhoods of Sunrise, or the historic downtown district of Starshine. All three explorable districts of Vancouver have charming and interesting characters with problems for you to help solve. Or you can take your hand on their illegal brawling tourneys and seize the championship.
